		                    Stage II Testicular Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage II testicular cancer depends on whether the cancer is a seminoma or a nonseminoma.    Treatment of seminoma may include the following:         - When the tumor is 5 centimeters or smaller:               -  Surgery to remove the testicle, followed by radiation therapy to lymph nodes in the abdomen
